title: SunshineFreedom
author: SunshineFreedom
content: We are hiring a coder to make email software that can be installed on a fresh Linux VPS.  This software does unique things with the way it handles TLS and you’d need a lot of knowledge about how email servers authenticate and handle TLS packets.  You can pick what language you write it in.  You get paid in cryptocurrency. Work on your own hours from home.For this gig, you’d need deep knowledge of:--IMAP emails--how TLS packets interact with email servers--How servers authenticate emails (DKIM keys, SPF, DMARC, ect)-general familiarity with previous software like Dovecot and PostfixSession (preferred):0570a194a8128b40a20ced31de1a76f105ed9eafa8e6ffca6065d7bc0ce71ce148email:so.Where.is.the.Love@protonmail.com
